subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets held a team meeting before Wednesday’s game against the Brewers, which they entered with baseball’s second-best home record (26-11) and second-worst road record (10-25).
snippet: The Mets held a team meeting before Wednesday’s game against the Brewers, which they entered with baseball’s second-best home record (26-11) and second-worst road record (10-25).
